about_the_game:
Cribbish is a deck building roguelike with it's roots in the classic card game Cribbage. But what starts off as a simple decision around what 2 cards to put in the crib...

Quickly turns into an adrenaline-fueled chain reaction of card modifiers that amp up your score.

Combined with a set of carefully selected relics and potions that can launch your hand scores into the stratosphere. 

You will need to become a master of chaining together all the tools that Cribbish puts at your disposal if you hope to beat the final Elite Challenge!

  • 20+ different decks to choose from

  • 4 different difficulties to choose from

  • 12 different card enhancements to power up the cards in your deck

  • 100+ relics, each with it's own unique ability to boost your game

  • 25+ potions to provide you with instant help when needed

  • 35+ perks that you can use to bend the rules in your favor or upgrade your relics/potions

  • 50+ brutal and elite challenges to stand in your way as you climb the peg board

Be on the look out for synergies between these items, they will not only boost your game but they have the power to increase your scores EXPONENTIALLY!

Per run stat tracking will help you analyze your game and make improvements. Lifetime user level stats will not only allow you to track your own progress towards becoming a Cribbish master, but they will unlock special items along the way to give you an even bigger edge.
